meaningMnemonic: An <kanji>artisan</kanji> who is a <kanji>giant</kanji> in their field is a <vocabulary>master</vocabulary>! Everyone knows their name! Or, they're just really large... like tall, so everyone calls them a master cause they don't want to get crushed.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
